SAVE AND EXIT EXIT ANYWAY File deleted No connection available Field is not valid web URL Delete Sort by Show Newest to oldest Oldest to newest All Photo Video Audio Exit Camouflage Hide Tella on your device Save anyway Wrong credentials, please check username and password No address associated with hostname There was an error trying to connect to the server Tella was unable to connect to the internet and confirm server information Try again Start Documentation and protection Tella enables anyone to document human right abuses, violence and corruption without putting themselves in danger. Protection against device searches Tella can be hidden on your device and any file captured in Tella or imported is automatically encrypted and stored in a hidden gallery. Easy data collection Online or offline, fill forms and surveys directly from your device. You must be linked to a sponsor organization that creates forms and manages the data. Emergency alert In emergency situations, delete sensitive information from Tella in just a few seconds. Grant permissions Tutorial In order to function properly, you need to grant Tella the required permissions. One last thing… In order to function properly, you need to authorize Tella to: • access your device storage (to export files from Tella to your device) • access your camera (to capture photos and videos) • access your microphone (to record audio) • access your GPS (to determine your geolocation when you capture data or multimedia, to make them verifiable) Selected files Select a custom icon and name to better hide Tella on your device. Note that the Tella icon will remain visible from the Android settings menu. Camera CameraPro SuperCam EasyCam Save to device Verification mode Makes your media files verifiable by collecting information about your device and location. Easy data collection To receive forms and submit data, you must first connect to a compatible server. Ask your sponsor organization for the server information and set up the server here. There are no draft forms to show There are no submitted forms to show There are no forms to show. Tap the refresh button to check if there are blank forms available from the servers you\'re connected to. Change appearance Select a different name and logo There are no files to show. Tap the + button to import files Collect Help Collect is a tool to collect data by filling forms and surveys directly on your device You’re not connected to the internet. Try again when connected. Share crash reports Crash reports help us improve Tella. They are automatically sent and include data such as device model and Android version. Add group Add One More Group? Add New Group? Please continue. %d element %d elements Documentation Protection Learn more Add server Activate QUICK DELETE button Shows a sliding button on the homescreen to quickly delete Tella data in emergency situations. Delete Gallery This will delete all photos, videos, and audio recordings from the Tella Gallery. Delete draft and submitted forms This will delete draft and submitted forms, and all the data they contain Delete server settings This will delete your connections to servers and all forms associated with them. Delete Tella This will delete the app and the data it contains. You will be asked \"Do you want to uninstall the app?\" Unless you confirm, Tella will not be deleted. Offline mode In offline mode, all data is saved for later submission. It\'s useful to save cellular data or if you have a bad connection. Disable when you\'re ready to submit forms. Offline mode In offline mode, all data is saved for later submission. It\'s useful to save cellular data or if you have a bad connection. Disable when you\'re ready to submit forms. Offline mode Edit to resend Form submitted Password Name is not set Form saved for later submission because Offline Mode is activated. Form data Error loading form Internet connection too weak File encrypted Hide Collect forms and servers has been deleted Licenses To receive forms and submit data, you must first connect to a server. Ask you sponsor organization for the server information and set up the server. If you would like to create your own forms, contact us or use any service based on the Open Data Kit (ODK) If you are not connected to the Internet, you can still fill forms. The data will be submitted as soon as you get online. The server is rejecting your submission. It may be because an attachment is larger than the size allowed. Submitting If you exit now, you will be able to submit the remaining files later. Unchecked items will be saved for later sending. Form saved for later submission. Unpin from the top Pin to the top Forms available on server Downloaded forms Verification mode is ON but GPS is OFF. Turn ON GPS in order to capture the geolocation of your evidence. Ignore Turn on GPS Update in progress… Canceled Update completed. Share verification information One or several selected files contain verification data, including device, network and geolocation information. Only share if this will not put you at risk. Share media + verification information Share only media file WiFi info Device identification Network information Collecting information to make your file verifiable. It can take several minutes. Make sure your device\'s view of the sky is unobstructed for better results. Metadata Help Where the file was located in the Tella directory. A unique number to identify the file. The date and time the file was last modified on the device. The name of the device manufacturer. The exact model of the device. A unique number identifying the Android device. The exact screen size of the device. The language the device\'s operating system is set to. The geographic region the device is set to. Whether the device is connected or disconnected to the internet. If the device is connected to the internet, specifies whether it is to a WiFi network or to a cellular network. A unique identifier to the device\'s Wi-Fi connector. A unique address identifying the device\'s internet connection. A more recent identifier to a device\'s internet connection. The exact location of the device, includes latitude and longitude coordinates, altitude in meters, the accuracy of the measurement in meters, and the time of the measurement. How location is determined. "Fused" means it\'s using a mix of methods, including GPS and network connections. The speed at which the device is traveling. The identifying numbers of all the cell towers the device is connected to. The name of all WiFi networks in the vicinity of the device. Some forms have been updated. Tap the update button to get the latest version. Server Which server would you like to upload the files to? What type of server? Open Data Kit (ODK) Select the type of server you want to connect to. If you are unsure, ask the organization coordinating the documentation effort. Direct Upload Connect to servers Manage your connection to servers to send data. Disconnect server(s) Would you like to delete your server connections altogether, or simply hide them? Hiding will keep server information in memory so that you can easily reconnect and submit data to the server(s). If you delete this server, you will no longer be able to send file.
